creator: Crastinate
descriptionHtml:
It’s all about ideas and creativity.
We often confuse the word procrastination with Doom scrolling and Binge-watching. Are we right? If
Sir Isaac Newton was sitting under the tree and doing either of that, would there be Newton’s Law of
Universal Gravitation?
There would be apples falling on Sir Isaac Newton’s head and he would be still consuming content
and feeding his brain with over-information. Instead, the people back then knew the real way to
procrastinate. Sir Isaac Newton was sitting there observing the beauty of nature and that’s where he
got his revolutionary idea.
Procrastination is a very pure word that means taking a break from work to rejuvenate and come up
with better and more creative ideas for work. Creativity is energy that has to be created again when
it gets exhausted from work. Procrastination can change the world. All the important people today
have come up with ideas while procrastinating. Did you wonder why the best ideas are born while
taking shower?
In this machine world, where everything will be automated, we will just have a single task to do. To
come up with Ideas and be more Creative. This is where Crastinate comes in.
Crastinate’s working
Crastinate works by making folks aware of their time and their tasks. Along with that if they still
don’t feel like working, we ask them some psychological questions and make them aware of certain
issues which are present in their mind. The cherry on the cake is the music feature which helps in
relaxing their minds, the notes where people can burst out their thoughts and the leaderboard
which rewards people for their work.
Let’s bring back the purple era
Innovation pushed the human race forward but it ended up making people money-minded. The era
of free people who are finding their purpose has faded away in this era of aggressive innovation.
Was the prediction in the book ‘1984’ by the famous English Novelist George Orwell, right? Can we
reflect back to the era of purposefulness, the era of ambition, the era of creativity, the era of
freedom, or the era of passion? The Purple Era. We believe that every single being on this planet still
feels a void because of this. There is a lack of meaning in life. So, yes, let’s bring back the purple era
together.
Are you an Artist?
The fact that we all will agree is that technology has made us lazy and dependent. This is where the
force of the universe plays an important role. A force that controls the entire universe. One word.
Love. Those people who follow their hearts and do what they love to do are called Artists. This way
of working gives a sense of purpose and satisfaction.
We have not created Crastinate to target some specific age group of people. We have created it to
target a category of people. There are only 1% of people on the Earth who can be called an Artist.
Those who have the power to bring back the purple era, those who are living free by doing what
they love to do and those who enjoy the most in the present moment. Those are the users for whom
we have created this insanely cool app, Crastinate. Only for Artists.
descriptionShort: It's all about ideas and creativity. We want to bring the purple era again.
title: Crastinate
